response.original_title: Chucky & Tiffany Do London: International Murder & Mayhem
response.overview: The world's most deadly dolls come to London to wed and honey moon. However, life imitates art as people they have met go missing under suspicious circumstances. Hot on their synthetic heels is media super star and American investigator - Wayne Ringburn. As the mutilated bodies of the missing begin to pile up, Ringburn himself seems in danger of joining them as he vow's to track Chucky and Tiffany down.
response.title: Chucky & Tiffany Do London: International Murder & Mayhem
